sense.gloss: to be frugal, to be sparing
to regret (e.g. a loss), to feel sorry (for)
to be unwilling, to be reluctant

sdata.j: ↑鞭↑↓むち↓を↑惜↑↓|お↓しむ|と↑子供↑↓こども↓は↑駄目↑↓だめ↓になる。
sdata.e: Spare the rod and spoil the child.

sdata.j: ↑行↑↓い↓く↑秋↑↓あき↓を↑惜↑↓|お↓しむ|↑気持↑↓きもち↓でいっぱいだ。
sdata.e: The passing autumn fills me with a feeling of grief.
